document_data.name: Udzgul Thairharrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Udzgul Thairharrow''' was a farmer in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 13{{th}} or early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/54/The Everwinking Eye: Elminster's Guide to the Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting|16-17}}{{Cite polyhedron/56/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Maskyr's Eye|27}}
document_data.Personality: He was considered to be half-witted.
document_data.History:
When the folk of Maskyr's Vale came to investigate the collapse of old [[Maskyr's Tower]], Udzgul claimed to have spotted a silvery doorway appearing for an instant in the air high over the ruins at sunset,It is unknown when these events occur, but given that Khonduil was still alive as of the late 1350s DR, it is presumed to be within his lifetime and thus somewhere in the late 13{{th}} early 14{{th}} centuries DR.

Udzgul was deceased by the late 1350s DR.
